reviews.review_text: Good product but bought at market price.

What should I say.... Redmi note 5 pro is beyond to all phones.. Picture quality is awesome and talking about value of money, then the price of this phone is like anyone can buy it and for me it's the bestest phone I ever had, battery is speechless because once I charged it full at night then next day evening the battery level is 50% as I use internet a lot still it is very useful.. Thumbs up to the Redmi
reviews.review_header: Redmi note 5 pro is awesome with its camera

reviews.review_text: Least expected from Amazon, the phone received was a defective one, I presume the fact was known to the seller. The volume and lock keys do not respond. And the phone hasn't rebooted since last night.
Excellent phone, sound system was good, voice and picture clarity are very good, got in diwali offer for just 10k, value for money.
Mobile is good but there are too many advertisements in inbuild applications... We have paid already for for software as well as hardware so plzz stop harassments of redmi users and stop these ads
reviews.review_header: Too much advertising in inbuild apps

name: Mi Redmi Note 5 Pro (Gold, 64 GB, 4 GB RAM)
